roleset.name: to come down, lower oneself, or arrive, lowering
roleset.note: DESCEND-V NOTES: Member of VNcls escape-51.1, meander-47.7. (from descend.01-v)
DESCENDED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to descend.01-v. (from descended.01-j)

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: District police in 1983 descended on his suburban home , which he and his large family used as both residence and factory , and demanded proof the house and equipment were his .
example.arg: on his suburban home , which he and his large family used as both residence and factory ,

example.name: with source
example.text: That is not entirely true , for linguists know too much about language to suggest that there ever was , literally , a single language [from which]-1 all Indo-European languages descended *trace*-1.

example.name: with ArgM-DIR
example.text: Ralph's descending from the mountain was met by cheers from his teammates.

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: The SWAT team's descending on his house finally roused the criminal from his lair.
